%% Because html converters don't know tabularnewline
\providecommand{\tabularnewline}{\\}

\makeatother

\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}
\begin{tabular}{ccc}
\toprule 
 & \multicolumn{2}{c}{Perception }\tabularnewline
\midrule 
Reality & Wolf - Yes & Wolf - No\tabularnewline
\midrule 
\multirow{2}{*}{Wolf - Yes} & Respond and Rescue & Stay Put \tabularnewline
 & Time and Efforts well spent & Loss of Assets\tabularnewline
\midrule 
\multirow{2}{*}{Wolf - No} & Opportunity Cost & No Harm\tabularnewline
 & Waste of Time and Efforts & Zero Cost\tabularnewline
\bottomrule
\end{tabular}
